text: The gross return on capital expenditure on town and neighbourhood shopping centres development that the corporations must look to recoup the high costs of main sewerage and drainage, main roads and other special development expenditure. The gross return on capital expenditure on town and neighborhood shopping centres ranges from 6 to 13 per cent.
